name: Purifiers
description:
Through Pain, We Are Cleansed
Purifier cultures believe that suffering and hardship burn away weakness, leaving only strength and truth. They practice ritual self-mortification, embrace painful ordeals, and see comfort as corruption of the spirit. To them, easy paths breed weakness, while agony forges unbreakable will. Pain is not avoidedâ€”it is welcomed as the ultimate teacher and purifier of body and soul.

culturalRestrictions.name: Daily Mortification
culturalRestrictions.description: You must take at least 1 self-inflicted damage to your health or 3 damage from an ally each day, or lose 2 resolve. When you take damage in this way, it is not mitigated by morale.

culturalRestrictions.name: No Comforts
culturalRestrictions.description: You do not gain resolve or morale for completing a favorable rest or from consuming food or drink. However, you don't lose morale when completing an unfavorable rest.

benefits.name: Rise in Pain
benefits.description: When you complete a full rest with half of your maximum health or less, you gain 5 morale.

benefits.name: Embrace Suffering
benefits.description: When you are suffering from any physical condition, you gain a bonus dice on all endurance and resilience checks. This bonus does not occur if you have any mental conditions.

startingItems.name: Purifying Knife
startingItems.description: A small dagger that always deals 1 physical damage to willing creature, regardless of any physical mitigation.

startingItems.name: Spiked Crown
startingItems.description: A jagged metal band with protruding spikes that dig into the skull and cause constant pain. When you wear this during a full rest, make an endurance or resilience check of 7 or higher to gain 1 morale - otherwise you lose 1 morale. An unwilling creature that wears this crown has a penalty dice to all resilience and endurance checks after wearing it for 1 hour.

startingItems.name: Iron Mask
startingItems.description: A mask made of iron that covers most of your face, obscuring your identity. Wearing this mask gives you a bonus dice to any presence checks against humanoids you have dealt damage to within the last day.
